com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller

Class BrightcoveSeekBarImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.ProgressBar
        • android.widget.AbsSeekBar
          • android.widget.SeekBar
            • com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.BrightcoveSeekBarImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, BrightcoveSeekBar

    public class BrightcoveSeekBarImpl
extends android.widget.SeekBar
implements BrightcoveSeekBar
    Provides a default Brightcove seek bar included with the default Brightcove media controls. It fully supports using markers. This class is heavily based on work done by Kate Kelly and Tim Parsons as part of the Tina project.
